messages.message: I basically made this request by looking at the network calls in chrome for uploading files, as well as looking elsewhere in the code for upload calls, so I donâ€™t think it is a problem with the request data format itself
Removing the Authorization token also results in the same result, making me think that this is an issue with the auth

is it possible that uploading files is not possible using the OAuth tokens? I am not familiar with how we authenticate on the backend, but it seems like Views that have an annotation with `OAuth2Scope` permit calls using OAuth, but the UploadFile-related views do not seem to have this annotation
Just saw this, did this work before? nothing has really changed along this code path in a while (afaik)
